description: In a speech on the Senate floor, Senator Mitch McConnell, the majority leader, defended Judge Brett Kavanaugh against the sexual misconduct allegations against the Supreme Court nominee and said Democrats were helping conduct a “smear campaign.”
title: McConnell Accuses Democrats of ‘Trying to Destroy’ Kavanaugh
title_page: McConnell Accuses Democrats of ‘Trying to Destroy’ Kavanaugh - Video - NYTimes.com
